question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Vehicle Protection Devices, Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, City Hall Roof Replacement, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain (FEMA Project), Birdview Avenue Improvements (CalOES Project), Outdoor Warning Sirens (FEMA Project), Guardrail Replacement Citywide (FEMA Project), PCH Median Improvements Project, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure
